string_table:
How else can I help you? .
There's a case here. A new bandit group has settled in Forestry. The leader is rumoured to have a nickname: Chapay. I need to meet him and talk about life. I ask you to meet him and tell him about it. .
Yeah, no problem. I'll be right there.
The leader of the local bandits wants to have a life chat with you. His nickname is Sultan. You can find him on Skadovsk. He invites you for a cup of tea. .
For a glass of tea you say... That's good. I'll look into it when I have time.
That's good.
Hello, Degtyarev.
Hello. Tell me, how did you guess that I am Degtyarev?.
It's very simple. My profession is whistleblower, I trade information in the Zone. I sell important information about caches and more. My information is valuable, and will serve whoever has it well. If you have a desire for this information, I am at your service.
Greetings to you. Ask me if you need anything.
Tell me about yourself..
I am an informer, trading information in the Zone. I sell important information about caches and more. My information is valuable, and will serve whoever has it well. If you have a desire to get this information, then I am at your service.
I need valuable information. What do you have?
What I've got, I've already told you. I know all about the schemes and more. But the thing is, I can't pass this information on to you that easily. I have a huge number of questions. If you want to get valuable information, you'll have to answer my questions. They're not that complicated, so there shouldn't be a problem. The rules are as follows: if you get a correct answer series of 5 or more, you will get valuable information from me in the form of advice, and I will also give you a bonus payment for your correct answer series. In addition, for each correct answer, you will receive a certain amount of money. Is that clear?
Yes..
Fine. When you're ready, let's play.
I'm all about the information. Let's play your game.
All right, come on.
I would like to leave the grouping.
Think with your teapot, maybe you're imagining things? Or are you out of your mind?
Yes, it seemed. Sorry.
Don't do that again, got it?!
No, I'm leaving. There are more important things to do than ours.
Well, if you want to leave, then put the 5 grand in here and get out. Or don't you have any money?
Yes. Here you go.
You can get out of here, nobody's holding you.
I have the money, but I won't give it back. So, I'll stay in the grouping for now.
Then sit tight.
I don't have that kind of money. I'll bring it another time.
Goodbye..
I wanted to ask you a question.
And what, you wanted to ask me?.
Out of the corner of my eye, I notice you have a pack of cards behind the bar. How about a game of point, for money?
This is it. We'll play by my rules: if I lose, I'll pay for my loss with e-money, but if I win, you'll pay in cash. Get the money ready then, and I'll do it now: I'll shuffle the cards. .
Agreed. Already done..
Wonderful, I'm ready too. Let's play.
What, another point?.
Yes, come on.
Got you, I'm ready as you can see. Let's play.
I forgot. I'll ask next time.
Only not a point, another time.
I don't agree, those rules don't suit me.
I hear you're selling stalkers tips on geocaches, don't they lie?.
Yes, I know a lot of geocaches, for this I share with you. One geocache - 1000 electronic rubles..
Got it, thanks for the info.
I'll get e-money, you'll get my stash.
Can I buy a geocache? .
Yes, one geocache is 1,000 e-rubles. Pick a location.
Zaton..
Jupiter.
Pripyat..
Yes, one stash is 1,000 electronic rubles.
Okay, here are the coordinates of the stash.
Okay, here are the geocache coordinates.
Give me 1 geocache.
Give me 2 geocaches.
Give 3 geocaches.
Give me 4 geocaches.
Give me 5 geocaches.
Give me 6 geocaches.
Give me 7 geocaches.
Give 8 geocaches.
Thank you..
Say if you want more.
Some other time.
If you need to tell me, there are always geocaches to be found.
I don't have enough money.
Never mind, you'll get the stash at once.
I'm looking for a subspace repeater. Do you know where to find one?
Heard of a thing like this. Kardan used to tell me a lot of things when he got drunk. He said that such a thing had been created in radio engineering at the Jupiter factory. He also said that this device would be a good substitute for a radio, if it didn't weigh so much. He said that repeater weighed about 200 kg, go and carry such a thing in your pocket. Look for it in the interior of the plant, I don't think anyone took it away. It's probably still lying there somewhere. Oh, and I almost forgot, the mercenaries were interested in something like this, so you should be careful out there. .
Thank you for the information.
I don't trust you too much to share this information yet.
All right..
No..
I don't have that kind of money.
I really need this information.
That's it. Information of this level is worth 10,000 rubles. Interesting?
Yes..
Heard of a thing like this. Kardan used to tell me a lot of things when he got drunk. He said that such a thing had been created in the radio engineering department at the Jupiter factory. He also said that this device would be a good substitute for a radio, if it didn't weigh so much. He said that repeater weighed about 200 kg, go and carry such a thing in your pocket. Look for it in the interior of the plant, I don't think anyone took it away. In fact, somewhere there it is still lying around.
What kind of parts are needed for the retrofit?
Anything, you find a gun, bring it to me, the same with the armor, I'm not interested in the condition, because the junk goes to the disassembly. You can bring an artifact, their elements I also use. Put the found in the safe behind you. .
I see. I'll go and get the stuff.
beard, switch off the radio.
Now..
I will..
beard, switch on the radio.
Will do..
Yes, now.
May I ask a question?.
No problem, ask.
Tremor, have you never heard of Living Water?.
Feldsher, have you never heard of Living Water?
Maybe you've heard it, maybe you haven't. Why should I tell you? Information in the Zone is expensive.
What can I do for you to get this information?.
It's a mundane matter, I need a first aid kit, I've got the coordinates, but no one to go to.
I'll help.
Then here are the coordinates, go get the first aid kit.
Got it.
And... brought what I asked for?
Maybe so, maybe not...looking for me.
Yes, here you go... So, what's up with the Living Water?
Something I've heard. Ah, I seem to remember. Ozersky in the scientists' bunker was talking about it. This water seems to be mentioned in early stalker legends, supposedly it can bring the dead back to life. Ozersky knows this legend better than I do, go to him. .
Thanks for the info, bye.
I'm about your assignment.
Hello. The mutants are getting close. We don't have many people. I know you're a good shot. I'll give you two guns to choose from and ammo for them. Shoot whatever you want, but the mutants won't get through. And if it works out, I'll pay you handsomely. Will you help me?
Yes, I will. What's going on here anyway?
Do you not know? There's a wave of mutants coming at us! Good thing you're here, now we'll give them a decent fight back! Here you go...
What do I have to do?.
Get a position aboard the barge, and when it starts, act according to the circumstances. Or do you need time to prepare?
No, you don't have to, I went to the position.
Then go ahead.
Got it.
Going to get ready, I'll be back soon.
Hurry up, the mutants will be here soon.
Got it..
No, I don't have a sniper rifle, why?
Then go get it, there's a wave of mutants coming, and we don't have a good sniper! And prepare well, just hurry up, I can already hear them coming. As soon as you find the right weapon, take your position immediately. .
I'm going to go get my rifle, I'll be right back.
Are you ready?
Yes..
Then take your position.
Got it..
No..
Why are you standing there, go help fight off the mutants.
I know.
Thanks for killing the controllers. Those bastards conspired together somehow... Never mind, without their guidance the tide would soon fizzle and fizzle out in less than twenty-four hours. Well done, stalker, here's your reward, now scram.... .
beach.
I told you to get in position, what the hell are you doing here? Run for position!
OK.
Find the right weapon?.
Finding..
Greetings, stalker. I have an urgent message for you from Noah.
Fuck him, let him solve his own family problems.
What's the message?.
Noy asked to see him urgently. I didn't understand much of what he said, but it seems to have something to do with mutants, some of our guys, led by David, are already at his place. And what, I wonder, is the nutcase up to this time? .
Thank you for your message, I'm off to the barge. .
I'm on another case.
Where in the vicinity can I find tools?
Selling this kind of information for electronic roubles only. I know a few places, which tools are you interested in?.
What other instruments are you interested in?
Not interested yet.
Tools for rough handling.
Tools for rough work.
Tools for calibration.
Military tools ORK-42..
Army tools RKB-86u..
I'll tell you about it for 3000 electronic rubles.
I'll tell you for 5000 bucks..
I'll tell you for 7000 bucks..
I'll tell you for 6,000 euros..
I'll tell you for 8000 electronic rubbles..
Unfortunately, I have no more information about these instruments.
My source says there are no more such instruments around.
I don't know anything else.
No further information about these instruments.
Unfortunately, we have no more information about these instruments.
I see.
understood.
Okay.
I see.
Fuck it.
I don't have that kind of money.
I changed my mind.
Take it.
Thank you..
Fine. I won't be able to describe the location verbally, but I'll pass the information on to your PDA..
Fine. I can't describe the location verbally, but I'll pass the information on to your PDA..
Fine. I can't describe the location verbally, but I'll pass the information on to your PDA. Here it is.
Fine. I can't describe the location verbally, but I'll pass the information on to your PDA..
Fine. I can't describe the location verbally, but I'll pass the information on to your PDA..
I brought you some derelict stuff, take it apart one day..
Thank you, I won't ignore such goodness...
I'm glad.
Tell me about yourself.
I am a medic, or rather a simple paramedic, or rather a veterinarian. I have arrived on "Skadovsk" under Tremor's request. He said that he needs help, as he cannot cope himself, so I have come. Don't get any ideas - I've got a diploma too. And I know all the potions - a hoof won't split in a lifetime. Show me your ills!
Stalker, I've been looking for you.
Yes. How do you know me?
I've got an assignment, I've got a tag on you. And I have a letter for you, here you go.
Thank you. Who passed it on?
Dude, some dick in a uniform, military or something... he didn't even introduce himself. Gave me an assignment, a letter and some money and ammo. Pass it on, he said, from hand to hand. So here you go, comrade. .
I see. Thanks for your service. Nothing to give you, so go with God.
Excuse me, I have to go, goodbye.
See you later.
Call sign?.
"Siren is blaring.
That's right. So, stalker, there's business for you, I've called you in as a veteran who can pull off special missions... but, you know, I can't give you the details -- state secrets. All right, I'm with the 4th Squad - senior wherever they send me. And we've got a big mission for you. The details of the operation you will find in the cache, it is located on the hill near the stone opposite the anomaly of the cauldron. We believe in you, go for it. .
I got it.
Go to the stash.
Got it.
I would like to look at another product.
get out of here, I'm busy right now, getting ready for another wave of mutants..
Got it.
Hello, newbie. What do you want?
Nothing.
Hello, stalker. Can you help me out? Not for nothing, of course - I'll pay.
No.
Yes. What do you want to do?
It's nothing difficult, just deliver the charges for the fireworks to a Drogov named Kanevsky, I'll give you the coordinates. Because, you see, I ate something - I can't go far from the jolt. So, will you do it? .
I can't, not much time.
No problem, give me your fireworks - I'll get you where you need to go.
here you go... don't drop it, look! Already passed the coordinates - you can move. And I'll warn Kanevsky too, so he knows that you're coming instead of me.
Got it. Departing.
So, did you get the package?
Not yet.
Something's creeping me out. Your fireworks look a hell of a lot like "hell machine". So, you're on your own. .
Your business...have to talk to someone else now...
I'm sorry.
Hello, stalker, is that you from the Avenger?
Yes. Here's the package.
Thank you. You should get a reward for that. There you go.
Thank you..
Hello, stalker. If you move on "Skadovsk", I can offer a little extra money.
For "Skadovsk", yes, for "Skadovsk"... Only I am here recently and where "Skadovsk" is - no idea. But anyway, no problem - money won't be superfluous.
. That's the deal. Here... this is my package. It should be given to Markovic, he's listed as the Skadovsk saver. Just give it to him and tell him it's from Petya. I'd take it to him myself, but I've got some important things to do, and Markovic is making a fuss - overdue, the meter and all that. How about it? Can you help me out?
Yes, I told you I'll help. But where is this "Skadovsk", point your finger at least?
Skadovsk is over there, see? No? Ok, look, there's a free man coming - talk to him. If you agree, he'll take you there. Just don't drag it out, or Markovic will really charge you for overdue. And by the way, talk to him about the reward too, because all mine is already in the safe. I have to go, goodbye.
Got it.
Hello, what can I do for you?
I'm from Petya, brought a subscription fee. .
Thank you, thank you, because I've been waiting for it - no and no, thank you again. Oh, there's not enough here! What's the joke...? No, it's all right, though. However, I forgot to introduce myself: the stalkers say "saver", but I'm the general financial manager of the Stalker Brotherhood on "Skadovsk", they call me Markovich. My main function is capital multiplication, i.e. to strike the iron, without leaving the office. Interest, deposits, custody and deposit secrecy. If you are interested, feel free to contact me. .
Of course, but not right now. Firstly, I'd like to get the couriers, and secondly - I'm more interested in the fate of the downed helicopters. Where do we start?"
About the couriers, Petyka left one suit at my place once, I don't need it. And I know very little about helicopters. Only that one of our novices saved the military pilot, but where this stalker and the pilot now, I do not know. However, I think Associate Professor Makovetsky will have something to say about it... He knows a lot of things, and he has been in Skadovsk for a long time, he has been talking to local guys, so it will be good to talk with him.
Thank you for the valuable information.
Hello, how can I help you?
Yes, I'm interested in fallen helicopters. Do you know anything?
I don't. I only know that one of ours saved a military pilot, but where that stalker and pilot are now, I don't know. However, I think that docent Makovetsky will have something to say about it... He knows a lot of things, and he has been in "Skadovsk" for a long time, he is negotiating with local guys, so it will be good to talk with him. .
Thank you for the valuable information.
You can't see - I'm busy... come back later.
Got it.
Oh, new faces, hello. I am a breeder, Associate Professor Makovetsky. I specialise in anomalous breeding, or artifact upgrading, locally speaking. I deal with artifacts of the first type of anomaly. Would you like to earn some money? .
I always wish, but just now I need some information.
Listen, young man, this is not the way things are done. "He who owns the information owns the world!" - have you heard that one? So I propose: first you help me, and then I will help you; in a manner of speaking, fairly and deservedly. .
Okay, what do you need?
Nothing supernatural - one place to check, near the Sawmill. One stalker kept telling everyone that there, in an acid anomaly, there was a new unknown rock. True, it's something I have not seen this stalker for a long time ... But he intrigued me. So if there still find this breed - bring it to me, I would be very grateful to you and will gladly give you an answer to any, your question.. .
Good..
The coordinates of the Sawmill and the only anomaly in that location.
I see. I'll check.
How's it going, did you find the artifact?
Haven't looked yet.
Found it. Though it was a bit tricky... considering there was only one backpack left of that stalker. Alright, hold on to your breed.
What a breed! What a breed! I've never seen anything like that... Hmm, the artifact isn't radioactive, very strange... Good work, stalker, now I'm ready to go along with you, what are you interested in? .
I need any information on downed helicopters. Do you know anything?
Ah, about helicopters... Just a little something. There was a stalker on "Skadovsk", his name was Garik. He saved one guy, as it appeared later, this guy was a pilot of military expedition, which was heading towards Pripyat. I don't know exactly where Garik and his pilot are now, but I remember clearly, that they were going to go to Jupiter... or not to Jupiter... no, exactly to Jupiter. Exactly where, however, is unknown to me.
Very valuable information, a revelation simply... And that's all I risked my life for in a fucking soda shop?.
Well, you know, you didn't take that much of a risk when you think about it... Do you want, I can tell you more about dissociation theory or describe the process of hydrolysis of complex salts, and about helicopters - ask the Informer. Knowing everything is his business, and his business is very profitable.
Informer, you say. Okay, that's something. Well, cheers, "acad?mieux."
Hello, Beard. Makovetsky says you know something about turntables.
I know. Garik, a stalker, one of the guides, picked up a military pilot near the "Iron Forest" and brought him to us... ...to make fun of him. Only now Garik is not on "Skadovsk" - he with the pilot went to Jupiter.
I see. How do I get there?
Talk to the pilot, he's our guide.
Thank you for the information.
You're welcome. By the way, I've always got fresh vodka on sale - come to me.
Be sure.
Get out of here, you big lug.
Leaving.
Listen, Jackal, I want to help you.
Ha-ha... and how can a salabon help me?
Nothing.
Chapaev ordered you, I signed up. And, if you call me a salabon one more time, this negotiation is over.
Whoa, don't get too excited... What a turn of events, man... and what do you suggest?
He wants you dead. As proof of that, he asked me to take his family weapon from you.
I see, got it. Need to think... complicated situation.
Waiting for an answer, but keep in mind: saving your hide is worth not only the donated barrel, but also a decent compensation, you understand me? .
...so be it, here's your name gun, give it back to him and tell him I'm dead. I think he'll buy it. And about the compensation... tell me, how much did he offer you?
Five kopecks.
Got it. Well, here's your compensation at double the amount offered. And try to convince him that I'm dead, otherwise you're dead. .
Got it, got it.
Got it. Well, here's your compensation for half of what he offered. And try to convince him that I'm dead, otherwise you're dead.
Thank you, man, I'll never forget what you did.
You're welcome.
Ten money.
Twenty grand.
Hey, you bastard, hold on...
Fuck you in the wheelhouse!!! Get the bastard!.
Hey, stalker, what do you want?
Nothing at all.
Chapaev, I was a bad bum from childhood, then reformed and became an honor student, but now I awakened a dark side - I have disassociated myself from the activists and really want to become a real bandos. .
You're such a fucking freak, you should be writing novels... OK, I'll take you, we always need guys like that, but first a test. You're not shitting yet?
Not that I'm shitting... There are just things to do... other things. I'll come back later.
Who's shitting?! I'm shitting?! Check!
I've got an assignment, if you do it, you're in, if not, you're fucked. Will you do it?
No..
Yes..
Good for you - not a pussy like some... Listen, what you're going to have to do is go to the substation shops, that's where the mercenary camp should be located. Since you're in a stalker camp now, they won't mow you down... right away, I mean. But they won't even let my archaedists get close to you - they'll kill you like dumb dogs. Anyway, there's a rat in that camp... I mean, a bitch... I mean, he's a real piece of shit. I won't go into why he's a rat and a bitch, but his nickname is The Jackal, which speaks for itself. Hunt him down and take him out quietly, because he's got a dozen goddamn brothers out there. Take the family weapon he stole from me and bring it back to me. If you do as I say, you'll get five grand from me and a share in our business. .
I see. Departing.
Here's a map of their base, study it and do as I say.
Got it.
So, bro, how's it going with my assignment?
I haven't taken it yet, but I'm on my way.
Listen, Chapaev... I think I'm going to give up the mission... I'm too shy. .
So, bro, how's it going with my assignment?.
I haven't taken it yet, but I'm on my way.
Listen, Chapaev... I think I'm going to give up the assignment... I'm too shy. .
So, bro, how's it going with my assignment?.
No more Jackal. Hold your gun.
Whoa, tough guy! Wow, you did it so fast. I can't believe this creep is dead and my weapon is back with me. Well done! Here's your reward, just like we talked about... Anyway, I'm putting you on the team. You passed the background check with flying colours. So, my house is your house, my tea is your tea... and all that.
Right decision. Alright, I'm off to sort out my issues.
Wait... I should also tell you to remember that from now on you're a real, live gangster, so go get suckers wherever you find them, and don't forget to chip in. Let's make sure you get your money's worth. .
Got it, absolutely.
Hello, brother! What's up?.
Hello..
Hey, you, punk! You don't want to live anymore, why did you come here in the first place? You're a fucking boy scout, get lost, we don't want any fucking pussies in the gang.
I'm on my way out.
Oh! Hello!
Good health. Where is Skadovsk, do you know?. .
Of course I do. I can even take you there, I need to pick something up. Well, shall we go?
I think I'll get there myself.
Yes, let's go. Just take a shorter route, not a lot of time.
All right, let's move out.
Yes.
Are you Degtyarev? Great, let's get acquainted. I've gathered half the squad here - three bayonets. We decided it would be better to split up, the other three will go in from the rear and open fire on our signal. By the way, here's something to back you up..
I see, I'll take command of the group, that's what the Sword said.
No question! Shall we move out?.
Yes.
No time to chat, need to move towards the base.
We're moving.
Hello stalker, my name is Sword. I'm in charge of special operations here at Zaton. If you want to make some extra cash, I've got some serious business to take care of..
This would be very helpful.
Other time.
The case is this. Not so long ago it became known that a gang of Chapaev, a local gangster half-poker, is planning an attack on Skadovsk, and not for any reason, but because of greed - it's too voracious this Chapaev. Must quickly cut them off at the root, otherwise there will be trouble... You're not going on the mission alone, but with Elbrus' brigade. They'll help you with ammunition and cover you in battle. Once you arrive at the rendezvous point, you'll take command of the group. Is it clear or should I repeat it?.
I see, off I go.
I don't understand, repeat please.
What about my task, have you completed it yet?
Not yet..
How's it going with my task, done yet?
Done. Handled that Chapa and his timurians too. And your guys were very helpful, thank you very much for that.
Well done, Degtyarev, we beat the bandits in one go! Now take this one as a token of thanks from me and the stalkers. .
Fine work, Degtyarev, we defeated the bandits in one go! Now here's the loot from me and the stalkers as a thank you.
Thank you..
Hello, Major, how are you?
Good.
How's it going, Degtyarev? You've settled in, I see.
Of course - the guys here are simple, you don't have to worry about getting a word in edgewise. And there is someone to have a drink with.. .
Hello stalker, my name is Sword. I'm in charge of special operations here on Zaton. The way I see it, you're still quite a rookie in rank - that's too bad. Because I have a very important assignment that I can't trust to a rookie. And on the other hand, there's no one to entrust it to - no one has good enough equipment. So when you gain experience, come and have a chat with me. Adrenaline I promise.. .
Got it.
Halt-fear! What's the diarrhoea, where are we going?
I didn't know you had a base here. Look, I just hid my khabar here, can you skip it?.
Ha... ha... ha... Khabar you say, I do not know, my brothers probably searched all the corners and took your loot .
No, I hid my stuff very well...
Well, then twist the kolobok - it's time to share. Don't think, it's not for nothing - it's our reward for keeping law and order in Zaton. Understand?. .
Yes, here's the money.
Oh, that's a smart kid! Well, good riddance! Come on in! And another thing, at our base do not dare to shoot with your gun, otherwise our all will be lifted in a moment, and they will not forgive you this - you'll be dead. .
Got it.
Wow, that's expensive! I've barely got a grand's worth of loot.
Yeah, just passing through.
So get out of here, you little brat, why are you staring then, get lost...! Don't you get it?
I got it, I got it, I'm leaving.
Fuck you... goat.
Come in, don't be shy.
I'm coming through.
And how much do you want?
Not "as much as you want", but as much as the pahan says, that's how much I ask for, suck it up?! Fee according to the taxa, the taxa is er...ten slashes.
Hello, stalker. You know, I'm bored with this zone - want to somehow, yes to diversify their lives, to let the grimness of everyday life down and earn money for a ticket out of here ... decided to go into bodyguarding. My rate is low, I'll charge you twenty thousand, because I can see in your eyes that you understand me, brother. Well, make up your mind, shall we dance in the zone for two, or go our separate ways like ships at sea?
Stay here and attack.
Yeah, bro, I guess I'll take you.
Excuse me, man, I can't deal with you right now.
What do you want?
Guard me.
Do not use a weapon.
Stay here.
You can leave, you're free.
Anything rare for sale?
I don't know, maybe %c[255,1,128,54]binoculars%c[default] will interest you, I bought them from a stalker recently, I can offer...
I'm not interested, orphan choice.
Good choice, cost of binoculars: 3000 rubles.. .
Normal choice, cost of binoculars: 2000 rubles.. .
Standard one I can give you anyway - I have plenty of them, take it.
Come on..
Here you go.
Thank you.
You don't have to.
Fine, hold the binoculars.
Thank you.
Yes..
No..
It's too expensive.
Hello, stalker, what do you need?
I'm willing to haggle.
I see. Go for it....
nothing.
I don't need anything.
No, I will not cancel the order.
That's it! Come back in an hour, I'll have the goods by then.
I see.
I told you: there can only be one order. In order to order again, you will have to pay a forfeit of 500 rubles.
All right, pay up, here you go.
I'm going to cancel the last order and you choose the next one.
Can I place my order again?
It's too expensive.
I changed my mind.
Okay..
Fine, the order is placed, now all you have to do is pay for the delivery and it's done.
No question, on which product? And note: there can only be one active order. You can cancel orders, but there are penalties.
I would like to place an order for a product.
Weapon, armour? Take your pick.
Arsenal..
Armour suit.
"PP-19 Bison-2".
"Helmet Ranger".
"Military PMK-3 gas mask
"Gas-security kit GDMZK"
"SSP2-2Mv SEVA 2".
"TPK-12MSS Neutrite Heavy Armoured Suit

I'll tell you an interesting story. There was one guy, he was called Cook. Not because he cooked, but because he could smell the meat grinders a hundred paces away. So he got cocky. I say, every day I save you from a fierce death, and Chapaev gives me the same share of the spoils. He's forgotten who he's under, you louse... I called him out and knocked him unconscious. While he was lying there, I broke his fingers, the bitch. Then the boys blindfolded him, twisted his arms and took him to the right place. I decided: if he walks a hundred paces, I'll leave him alive. But he didn't make it: just at his favourite "Meat Grinder" he ran into it. Once a cook, now a mincemeat. What? Don't spoil it! .
What's new in the Zone?
Well... The emissions have been kicking in more often. The old tracks are gone, maps are laid out differently now. Many new things have been discovered - and the placers there, I think, are not bad. It was quiet, the moon was shining, everything was fine, just like in a graveyard. I'm just a little bit too drunk to drink. Come on, let's go... we're talking. Suddenly there's a rustle from under the bushes on our left, we're shooting, then a rustle from the right, then right and left... ...we're cheating and start shooting in all directions... We looked round bushes - nobody. Well, I thought, they squirreled the squirrel together with boys... A minute later the rustles came up again, we started shooting again... but nothing; not even a bloody trace of the creature we thought we'd shot at... and then one of the brothers gets jumped by a boar, from the back... took the boar down, the brother's alive. After that, we overdid it and drove to the base. And already near base I - in pockets, and there - a dick, no torch. I haven't been to the petrol station since, but I'm sure my torch is in there somewhere. I want you to go over there and find my torch. Can you do that?

I'm looking for a subspace repeater. Do you know where to find one?
Yes, you know, I am familiar with this device. It is designed to transmit high-frequency radio waves over very long distances, I would even say astronomical. It was developed by our radio engineering department at the Jupiter plant, but we didn't get any further work - the device weighed 200 kg and the bosses didn't like it, our project was soon frozen. I was very young at the time and worked as a junior researcher. But my career there did not work out because of an emergency evacuation at the beginning of 2006 and not because the project was stopped. The device you are interested in was hastily packed together with other valuable equipment and taken out of the Zone. However, some of the equipment was left, for reasons unknown to me, lying in the factory. Since I have not heard anything about the repeater in scientific circles since then, I must assume that it is still in the Zone. Pilot. What business is it of yours? Who are you?
Major Degtyarev, SBU. Arrived to investigate the reasons for the failure of the expedition. Do you know if any of the guys are still alive? .
Lieutenant Sokolov. Pleased to meet you, Comrade Major. It's been quite a while since the accident, rumours, of course, were that people in military uniform were seen somewhere on Zaton, but.... .
Do you think anyone else could have gotten out of the choppers? Maybe you're the only one of the whole group left alive?.
I'm afraid to even think about it. But I can not check - I somehow do not want to go past the stalkers, not all of them are as kind as Garik or Nitrogen. Maybe you can check? Pay you nothing, but I would be very grateful. .
I will check. That's when I arrived. But everything we talk about is strictly confidential. It's a state secret - a military man himself, you must understand. And you yourself, how did you survive? .
I don't remember it well... by a miracle, I guess. I was on the fourth - we were flying calmly... all of a sudden, rumble, smoke... it stunned me... and then, like a kick... I was thrown out of the chopper and into the sky. I don't remember how I opened the parachute and how I landed. I woke up not far from some power station... I don't know, I couldn't see. I didn't have time to come to my senses yet, and here - dogs! Five of them! If Garik hadn't come, they'd have eaten me! But all's well that ends well... I came here to Jupiter with Garik. And here I already went to the control point - without result, there's nobody there and, as it seems, wasn't. Besides, I got a little information - rumours abound. I hope it will be useful to you. So, half the expedition died in the Zaton area. One was in the South Plateau, the other fell into the swamp, and the third crashed at the substation. I don't know anything about the others, and I don't know where mine is either. I can't transmit coordinates yet, my PDA's out of power... As soon as it comes back on, I'll send you the information you need, so you can go back to Zaton. I think by the time you get there, my PDA will be working. Oh, and by the way, the helicopter doors might be locked electronically, so take my universal pilot key, you should have it now. .
Got it. Thanks for the info.

Hey, stalker, want to make some money?
No..
Yes, what should I do?
You see, friend... a long time ago, about six months ago, I lost my gun... here, almost already on approaches to Pripyat. Then I was in Kopachi village, well, where there were only hills instead of houses; I was looking for the artefacts there, and zombies were quite docile then, so I was hit with backhoe, struck straight on the loft. I don't know who it was, but still, when I woke up, my gun was gone. Although I did not understand what had happened at the time, because I was in shock. But I do remember that I tried to move my hands around, looking for the gun... I guess that bastard whistled, good thing I survived.
You're lucky to be alive. So what happened next?
I don't remember anything else. I just remember that the stalkers took me out and that's it. You know, after I got better, I wanted to go there again, to look for my gun, but my friends stopped me. They said there's been zombies living there for a long time, and more and more have been showing up lately, with guns... ...and it's not easy to get through. Unless you have a posse... five men... and I don't think anybody's gonna go with me for no reason. I don't know if that's where my bagpipes are. Anyway, I'd like someone to check out the place in this unfortunate village. I can't do it yet, because I'm not armed. Will you do it? I think I can raise six thousand for the reward. Huh?
Yes.
Well, here are the approximate coordinates of where I got whacked.

Let's see what I get... It's not working.... what would... let's try this... Oh! I didn't buy this software for nothing! Okay, data transfer started... 100% transmission. Okay, here's the new information, it looks like it's about a cement factory, because the only marker points to the factory. Get over there and search it carefully. I think that's where the bastard hid my gun.

In a nutshell, it's a complete asshole. Our fighters are having a bad time, monsters are constantly overpowering them. There are too many mutants....
What does your clan do?
Our clan lives in the Zone, exploring it. In a practical sense. I believe the Zone is an incredible opportunity for science, for all humanity. For so many years it has been supplying artefacts, utterly fantastic material for research, and more and more of it. And the anomalies? Such possibilities for experimentation cannot be created in any laboratory! I am sure: a few more years and, thanks to research of the Zone, there will be a qualitative leap in science, in many spheres of economic activity of mankind. Even those who do not know how to use a mobile phone will feel it. In short - we continue the work of the "Clear Skies" clan. Our clan consists mainly of former members of Clear Skies. Too bad that all founders were killed back at the storming of Chernobyl NPP in 2011.... .
Can I help with anything, maybe some medication you need?.
Well, so far, thank goodness, coping with the flood of wounds, there's still plenty of medkits... If you're really looking for some action, go to the factory, there should be a set of CCA72 meds in the warehouse area. If you find it, bring it to me, it's rare and valuable. You won't come up short.
Not now.
I will.
That's good.
I brought "CCA72."

And, Uncle Yar, is there anything else I can help you with?
I don't know... ah, remembered a poor guy, so sit down and listen: we had a newcomer here recently, everyone called him a nerd because of his glasses and camera. He was a photographer of flora and fauna. On the third day he lost his camera - he saw a mutant, and fled to the base, it was a curious sight, and his heels twinkled. And that mutant turned out to be... ...you know who?...you wouldn't believe it, a common marmot. Back at the base, he started annoying everyone, saying, what kind of creature is this, what kind of creature, in his homeland such insignificant creatures have never been seen... Now the nerd is asking our guys to bring him a camera, but they are mocking him, wanting him to go and get it himself. I felt sorry for him and wanted to go and get the camera myself, but the commander would not let me. Can you find it?
After, I can't now.

It's not good for an old man to keep pushing his luck. I've got to give up stalking. So, can you help me?

The essence of the operation is defined mainly in the destruction of accumulations of the enemy near the places of the forthcoming landing of helicopters for evacuation. We are forced to assemble a special detachment and send it to the enemy's area. At the moment - the detachment is already organized and awaiting further orders. Your company of such a high-priority operation will come in very handy. .
I agree. How many men are in the squad now?
I'm not ready for surgery.
Fine. There are five men in the squad, along with Major Saiga, who has been appointed commander of the operation. The squad is now in the courtyard and will be moving out soon. I will talk to Major Saiga about you, but in the meantime you go to the courtyard.
Got it.
Colonel, "Operation Vulcan" is successful.
Good news, our soldiers will be pleased. Where's Major Saiga?
He's all right, he's currently being bandaged by Lieutenant Rogovets.
That's good... here's your reward...
You.
Major Saiga dead.
Bad, such a guy was... Okay, here's your reward...
Before the meeting.

Come back tomorrow, Monolith will show you the way.
Good..
Invalid, the Monolith has informed me that you participated in the attack on us. You destroyed our antennae with which we spoke to him. Also, along with the military, you killed a high-ranking adept. .
Monolith made a mistake, I didn't kill anyone.
I admit it. How do I atone for my sins?.
Follow the will of the Monolith and follow the path he has indicated. First, help our brothers. Bring them back to life and you will be rewarded by Monolith's mercy.
What do I need to do to do this?
Military took back our warehouses where the anabiotics were stored and took them away. Bring back 10 anabiotics and live water. Atone for your sin. .
In Leon's case you brought, there were psi drugs. But the military took back our warehouses where the anabiotics were stored and took them away. Bring ten anabiotics and live water. Atone for your sin! .
I'm not ready.
I'll bring the cure, but where can I find living water?.
This secret was possessed only by Leon. This is the redemption of sins, that you must pass the test of the Monolith, rediscover the secret of the Living Water, and prove yourself worthy to serve him..
All right, I will do the will of the Monolith. Sins will be atoned for.
Monolith has already given you an assignment, do it.
Mandatory..
Have you done the Monolith's will, found living water and 10 anabiotics?.
Water found, but no luck yet with anabiotics, I'll keep looking.
Yes, I have done the will of the Monolith.
Monolith is grateful to you for helping the new brothers. This cure will bring them back to life and they will become our brothers. You are clean before the Monolith, you have atoned for your sin and can be considered our brother. Take this, it will give you the power and the right to use the tools of the Monolith. Use this knowledge to punish infidels and kill our enemies even more effectively. Rest, you have much to do on the path that the Monolith has shown you. Talk to our new brothers, they want to see you, after all they owe you their quick salvation.
Okay, I'll pay them a visit.
I'm about Monolith's will. .
Monolith's will fulfilled?. .
Are you ready to atone for your next sin?. .
No, I'm not ready yet.
Yes, I am ready to follow the path indicated by Monolith. What is required of me?
You must restore the Monolith caches and caches that have been looted by you and other military personnel. Place in them the weapons, ammunition and first-aid kits you stole. This will strengthen our brothers in the Zone and help them in time of need. .
How do I know where these geocaches are? And what do I have to put in them?.
Monolith bases are marked with a monolith symbol that only our brethren can see and understand, the uninitiated will not find it. Next to them is always a schematic representation of an atom with electrons spinning around it, it should be familiar to you. Put ammunition for the Monolith's main weapon, which the fools have nicknamed the gauss cannon, a few kinds of medicine for our brothers in trouble. And reliable, serviceable weapons for them. Put either an AKM-74, an LR-300 or a SPAS 12 in each of our stashes, and a magazine for each respective weapon, so that our brothers do not go unarmed in times of need. .
And where do I get ammo for the Monolith's main weapon?.
Our merchant, Mitrofan.
I understand, I will do the will of the Monolith.
Brother, the Monolith has already given you an assignment. Go and do it.
Good..
What do you say, Monolith's will is done?
I've already pawned a few geocaches, more coming soon.
Yes, I have complied with Monolith's instructions. All the stashes he specified are full again.
You've done well, brother. Our brothers, meanwhile, have rebuilt some of our warehouses too. If our brothers get into trouble - these hoardings will help them greatly. Our supply is slowly coming back to normal, no matter how much our enemies try to weaken us. And soon we will be ready to regain our former strength.
Something's bugging me: while on a mission, I came across a large group of mercenaries. They were prowling the grounds of the Jupiter plant, dressed lightly. It was clearly a mercenary reconnaissance unit. But there are no labs there, so they were looking for something else, something more important. These facts are not giving me peace of mind, brother. .
Yes, strange indeed. Mercenaries don't bode well, especially when looking for something under our noses. We'll deal with that later, but for now go get your reward from the merchant and rest, you still have a lot to do. .
See you later, brother.
Monolith doesn't need your help yet. Wait.
Waiting..
Congratulations brother, you have atoned for all your sins to the Monolith.
Thank you, brother.
Are you ready to atone for your last sin to the Monolith?
No, I'm not ready yet.
Yes, I am ready to complete the path that has been indicated to me by the Monolith.
It's time to take back your former power, brother. Let's cleanse the centre of the Zone of infidels again. For too long the Monolith has been silent, and our brethren have not heard him. Our Adept has been treacherously murdered. Murdered by you! But that is not the point. Many of our brothers stopped hearing him, doubted him and left us, as the Tramp did. Fools, the Monolith exists! And soon, very soon, it will speak again! We'll fix one of the antennas you destroyed, and the Monolith will be with us again! He will fill our hearts with power again, and our minds with clarity and enlightenment. .
What do I need to do? .
With your help, the antennas were destroyed. The Monolith used them to talk to our brothers. You need to rebuild one of the antennas, find its heart, a subspace repeater - only this device is capable of transmitting its will. And the Monolith will speak again!
Where do I get this device?
This secret was owned only by the Adept, our spiritual leader. It was he who communicated the will of the Monolith to our brothers. But he is gone now, and the secret has gone to his grave with him. You have connections with other clans, use them and find the relay. .
Okay, I'll find it. May the Monolith help me.
How's it going, brother? Did you find the subspace transponder?
Yes, I found it. It's on the grounds of the Jupiter plant, in one of the containers in front of the overpass. But from what I can tell, the device is too heavy and I won't be able to get it here myself. .
Hail to the Monolith, you've found it! Now we will restore our power and drive the infidels out of Pripyat! Don't worry about transportation, I'll send a group of our brothers, they'll bring the device here themselves. But you have a more important task: we must wrest one of the antennae from the infidels. They've occupied the Bookstore, our temple! And for that they must pay. Lead our brothers into battle. Punish them, cleanse them of their filth and rebuild our temple! Speak to Brother Eruption as soon as you are ready. .
Monolith help us!.
Brother, do the will of the Monolith... why are you still here?
I see.
Hail to the Monolith, you're back, brother! This means that all infidels are dead and no longer a threat to us. Very soon the Monolith will speak to our brothers again. We are growing stronger by the day, and all thanks to you. You have contributed so much to our clan, and you have not betrayed our faith in times of need, as apostates have done. Your merits will not go unnoticed. From now on, the brothers will call you Adept. You are now our new spiritual leader. Serve the Monolith, guide our brothers to the true path and communicate its will to them. Visit your brothers in the temple tomorrow, they will have to finish the repairs. The Monolith will want to speak to you himself. .
Serving Monolith. See you soon, brother.
Hello, brother.
You wanted to see me, brothers?
Yes, we want to thank you, brother. You saved us from the fate of wandering forever as zombies, or worse, from serving the controller.
Do you remember what happened to you?.
We don't remember much of our past lives. Everything was like a dream. I remember our group was big. We were in some factory looking for something, something important and very expensive. Then there was, I think, a controller, I remember a strong psi-punch, great pain... He managed to subdue us all and led us to some building. Then an unscheduled ejection began, the four of us were caught by it, the rest managed to be led away by the controller into the depths of the building. It was the Monolith that saved us! We were left to our own devices and heard his voice. In our zombie state, he became our guiding star, and we went for him. The monolith spoke to us and guided us! Next I remember a river with concrete banks, a canal I think, and a huge wasteland with buildings on the horizon. Not a single creature attacked us along the way - the Monolith was protecting us on the way there! Then there was a deserted town and houses, lots of houses with windows blown out. Pripyat! Suddenly Monolith's voice cut off and we didn't know where to go next. We were found and sheltered by the Monoliths. They took care of us and were waiting for some man with medicine. And then you helped us to come back to life, and the veil fell from our minds. Thank you again, brother. Thanks to you we have found a new family and we are happy now. Take our former weapons and equipment, the Monolith gives us everything we need. We don't need these things anymore.
Good to be of help to you. Goodbye, brothers.

Have a job for me?.
Of course, there's always plenty of work, especially for someone like me - there's almost never an extra pair of hands and feet to go everywhere. Therefore I am in great need of helpers. Work, of course, is not particularly easy, it's not you shoot mutants, but the pay is decent. I need to fulfill a number of orders for the local technicians Nitrogen, Garin and Kardan. I need to find them the information they need to improve something. Here: choose what interests you. .
Find information on armor upgrades..
All in all, recently in the zone picked up a batch of new types of suits - for the stalkers heavy duty Voskhod, based on the SCAT-10 made, and the military insulating Gagarin. Their quality is top-notch. Many existing prototypes are a hundred points ahead, but it's still a problem to improve them. So I signed up with Garin to get some information. I managed to dig something up, but the courier is nowhere to be found. The last time he got in touch was somewhere in the Sawmill, so you better look there.
Find data on upgrading assault rifles.
This job was offered to me a long time ago by Kardan. But we drank together then and I thought he wasn't serious. But recently he fell down here and said, so-and-so - so long as you will not find the information I need, I for my stalkers at Skladovskom will not do any repair work. In general, stubborn bitch, it turned out. Even Sultan and Sych talked, and not to send him to the nearest anomaly, but the only other technicians at Zatona can not find a day away from Zharka. So I went out of my way to please everyone. I got in touch with the right people and they helped me as much as they could. But it's always happens: their man contacted me, saying "meet me, I won't go to you across the Zaton without a guide". I went to see the pilot; it was his specialty. He agreed and left. An hour later he came back: "Your messenger had disappeared". No stalker goes to look for him at night. That was the end of our agreement with the guide. But it doesn't make me feel any better. In short, talk to him, maybe he'll tell you in what area he was looking for a messenger, and start searching from there. Maybe you'll get lucky.
Find information on upgrading sniper rifles..
This is how it turns out that I get lucky with couriers like a dead man. Almost all major orders nearly went wrong because of these jackasses. Courier got in touch yesterday, reported that he made it to the container yard on Jupiter all right and that he'll be here soon. Only I haven't heard from him in the last 24 hours. I think he ran into some local gangsters there and they shot him in the heat of the moment. We should go out there and look for him. I'm sure he's hidden everything.
I think I'll pass on this quest for now.
not interesting....
Okay, I'll try to deal with it.
Okay, I'll take care of it.
I'll talk to the pilot, but I'm afraid he won't tell me much, so I'll have to figure it out myself.

Fine, I think Garin will be pleased. Here's your cut. And about the courier don't take it into your head. This is the Zone, brother, it's often like this here. Eh... good man was... Anyway...
This is the PDA with the modification data of the assault rifles. Took a lot of work, though. Your messenger's dead - ambushed by mercenaries. The blues are finished, but still someone knew about your case, I advise you to be careful....
Fine, I think Kardan will finally stop raging. Here's your money. And about the mercenaries- very grateful to you. I'll have to be more careful with the customers from now on... .
Take, here's a folder with blueprints and instructions for upgrading sniper rifles. About the courier, you were right - rotten through and through. Tried to get the blueprints to Gawaii. But he didn't make it. The mob shut him down. But the Hawaiian was honest - all told me about it, though the stash of courier still had to find.. . . Good, because Nitrogen, go wait already. Here you go, your reward. Now the couriers will only have to hire proven ones....
I kept my promise.Now it's your turn. What do you know about the downed helicopters?
Garik, a stalker alone, picked up a military pilot, well, and brought him to us. Only now Garik and pilot are not on Skadovsk - they went to Jupiter. I think that the pilot could tell us a lot. .
I see, where do you find them on Jupiter?.
According to my information, they're both now in a scientist bunker, near Janov station.
Thank you for the information.
I'm always happy to help. Anything you need to know, feel free to ask.
For sure.
I'm from the Informer. Need to have a word about your failed meeting with his messenger.

Where were you supposed to meet him, and why do you think the messenger wasn't there?
He had to come to the Zaton from the Northern Swamps. They start right after Preobrazhenskiy bridge. Why it was not there I have no idea and I will not speculate. This is a Zone and anything can happen to a man here. One thing I know for sure, the informer was from the Freedom clan, and the Freemen, whatever they're called rummy here, will never bail and run away. The only thing I can guess is that the stalker was dead on the Northern swamps, where it's practically impossible to pass. Looking for and check I will not go - near the recycling station, and there - as you know the blue often hang out. More I have nothing to say.. . . Thank you very much, I'll go for a run to the bridge of Preobrazhensky....

I see where you're going with this. If you came here looking for that crazy messenger with the top secret information, you're a little late. He's been ponied by bandits 24 hours ago... heh-heh... at the nearest Roast! And I told him - it's not good to dump people, the Zone will eat you up anyway.... Did not believe me, and in vain .... .

Yeah, he didn't have time for shit. And he would have fused it to me, as you've already figured out. The only difference is that I would have had to give up everything when those people he sent would have sent fighters. And my life too... Anyway, when I made the deal, he went to his stash. He had it set up in a container yard, as it turned out later. Only by then, one of the local gangs had set up camp there. Well, when the courier went there, of course the gangs whacked him. And his hiding place is still untouched.
I mean the info my customer needs is now in a stash somewhere among those containers-okay, thank you.
