All right, Major, good job - here's your payment. Now leave me alone, I have something to think about. Come and see me tomorrow, we'll decide what to do next.
I'll be in touch.
Hey, what did you manage to find out?.
Yes, Major-- the news is not comforting.
What is it?.
I have become aware of the possible target of the Mecha group. I was informed of it by Nazar, the leader of the Dawn.
What, you reported it yourself?.
No, passed it on through his deputy. He's here on Skadovsk - his name is Legolas. He will help us coordinate our actions against the sinners here on Zaton.
What's on Jupiter?.
It's not so bad there - the mercenaries destroyed a large underground warehouse in Kopachi, supplying the group, and the "Duty" with the "Dawn" defeated a squad of sinners near the Karier. Things are much worse for us. .
So what about the Sword?.
Unfortunately, in all this confrontation with the sinners, we lack one thing - detailed information about the group's goals and objectives. The only major field commander Ibis was killed by you recently, and there were no other opportunities to track down their leaders. Even the military in Pripyat is deaf about it. .
Yeah, the SSU has already searched half of the Zone, so far to no avail. Anubis doesn't really count, there are some separate points about him. Several more of their pawns, such as Warg, Puppeteer, we also destroyed. We can only hope that the sinners themselves will be punctured and reveal the cards. .
Or they'll make a move, which is more likely. Okay, now about the Sword: it was recently reported that sinners are practically immune to psi influence from the outside. Found out about it by accident. Scientists, on the other hand, are shaking their hands, saying we don't have a clue. Only Nazar thought that it can not just be. .
I've known before that most likely the sinners are controlled by the same ones who hold the monoliths, only affecting them in a different way. .
Probably. But that's our only clue for now. We need to look for this new way of control.
And as I understand the Sword was doing just that.
Yes, when he was on Janova, he met with all the local clan leaders. Listened to all their theories and came to the conclusion that the sectarians were most likely influenced by some kind of special psi artifacts.. .
Who told him that?
That's what Nazar thought. That's why he gave the Sword a group of his men. Besides Loki agreed to help him.
And I've put that bastard Beetle in the group.
No, Beetle nailed it afterwards. Loki, on the other hand, organized a second group to work in parallel with the Sword group. It consisted of a few Dawnlings and five Freemen. .
And where was it supposed to be? .
Here, on the Zaton. Both groups were advancing on their routes, trying to find some leads. .
What makes you think that what you're looking for is right here in Zaton?.
There have been several times where stalkers have stumbled upon solitary sinners. And it couldn't just be that. These sinners were clearly looking for something. After all, even their scouting groups go in fives, but these were alone. So everyone agreed that this is where the search should start. .
OK, what can I do now?
Lately, the connection with the second group of allies has also disappeared. They may have also suffered the fate of the Sword, but you'd better talk to Legolas about it, he'll tell you what to do.
Good..
Hello, I'm Major Degtyarev, SBU. Investigating the aftermath of the Sin group here in order to suppress this activity. I'm from Granit. He said you might have something to report. .
I am Legolas. Nazar's deputy. I've heard a lot about you. You've helped our clan and all the free stalkers in the Zone. Didn't think we'd have to work together, but whatever. What's your opinion on what Granite told you? .
Certainly there's something to this. And in the absence of other leads, we'll work on a version of controlling sinners from outside. Only I think we need to look a little differently and not here. .
So you agree that the sinners, like the Monolith, are under psi control, only of a slightly different kind and not related to natural artefacts. Then what kind of control do you think it is? .
So it is. And the type of control can vary widely. From psi-pumping to direct suggestion from outside, either directly or via repeaters, like with the Monolith. .
Why aren't you taking the artifact version seriously?
What kind of artifact could it be that only one faction knows about it and no one has ever found it? No, it's something else. .
But if that's the case, then both groups wouldn't be missing, and you've already established that it was the sinners who killed Mecha. Isn't that proof that we're looking in the right direction? .
No, they want to lead us astray. They're counting on us to buy the destruction of these search parties and keep digging in the same direction. And believe me it will be to no avail. .
Then what do you suggest? .
Nothing so far. But I have an idea, or rather I think I know another possible not the last person in their faction. .
With Anubis you thought so at first too.
And how do you all know about Anubis?. .
My friend, people like him don't just appear in the Zone. These people become legends of the Zone. Remember the Strelka, for instance? Anubis didn't just show up, trust me. .
I believe it, but I'll get it out of the ground anyway. So, about the second group, what do you want to do?
Search for them. But I have no illusions, there is little hope that they are alive. My people are here in the Zaton, they will help the neutral stalkers. Yes, and I think the "freedom" will not stand aside. .
Specifically, what do you know about them?
In the Staircase you have to look for them first. They were there the last time I managed to contact them. Only you're not going there alone. Granite and I have assembled a group of different clan stalkers against the sinners, so you won't have to go it alone now. Now get to the Port Cranes- Klen and Thorus are waiting for you there. The Freedom Stalkers will come a little later, all Major, see you there.
Goodbye.
Hello, Major. Looks like we have one more task to complete.
Kleen, the vagabond. Survived the meat grinder, though.
What did you think? We nailed those thugs so hard, they wouldn't come out of their noses. But now the task is more serious.
Yes, I see. The Rassvetians are good, they don't leave their own behind. Okay, what's the point.
Looks like this - the last time the group made contact was from the Ladder Territory. You know, after Chapaev was kicked out of there Forestry became the most convenient car park in the area. Now there are always free people, or someone else hanging around, no beasts, no anomalies. And suddenly, in broad daylight, a group disappears. .
Shall we move out now?.
Yeah, those guys led by Thorus and the freedom fighters sent us a small squad - they just came out of Skadovsk now, they'll be coming up soon. Hannibal is their leader. .
What other instructions?.
Me and the scouts take the road and immediately take up defence at the west gate, Torus-you and yours can go directly through the bumps to the south entrance. And don't let anyone in from the other side. You, Major, stay better with us, on arrival with Hannibal's men, you'll survey the area. All right, let's go.
No fluff.
Fucking hell, what a massacre. Who the hell did this to them? Didn't leave a mark, either. Their guns are almost clean - they probably didn't even have time to fire a single shot. .
Yes, that was what Legolas had feared the most. Damn, another failure.
It feels like they've been hit over the head with a dust bag. Maybe there's a controller around, or maybe they're psionics. Can't you feel anything? .
Yeah, and yours must have been taken out by the zombies the same controller brought in. Bullshit. People took them down. They all had firearms. But they were hit with different calibers, mostly 5.45s, and some shotgun wounds. More like bandits, only they'd never be able to get up close and personal like that. .
Maybe the sinners? I mean, they're doing an all-out expansion right now.
Maybe. One thing that is clear is that the group was hit first with a powerful psi-strike and then finished off the helpless, almost at point-blank range. .
Yeah, stuff...Shit, wait...someone's on the phone....
What is it? ....
...yes, I see...Major-Legolas reported a large bandit formation spotted by Skadovsk Intelligence. They're coming towards us from the Port Cranes and the Preobrazhensky Bridge. We must take up defensive positions immediately.
The creatures want to ring, but how did they know we were here?.
All, Major, we can not delay...then we will discuss everything with Legolas, if we stay alive...fighters...
Here we go....
The adjacent group is destroyed, we are attacked by bandits. Maple is killed.
Damn it. I should have seen this coming. Hannibal and Thorus are they...?
It seems to have survived - stayed put. It's all very strange. A group of Svoboda's adversaries were shot at point-blank range. Most likely they were hit by a powerful psi hit. They didn't stand a chance. Immediately after we discovered them we were attacked by bandits. .
Where did they come from? I thought you had them under Skadovskiy. You did not notice anything strange in their attack? .
They probably didn't want to attack us. I think they fell under someone else's control too, as they attacked us incessantly and didn't count their losses. .
The situation is familiar. Bandits never go off like this - to certain death. Which tactic looks more like "Monolith" or "Sin". Most likely the sinners let them go ahead for the slaughter as a diversionary tactic. They themselves struck a little later. .
But surely someone ratted us out, they couldn't have just attacked?.
We couldn't. But we don't know who did. Looks like you were right about something. They're really trying to drag us down a false trail. Now they're hoping we'll reassemble a large unit and send them on their way after the last one. .
What do you suggest?
Me, nothing so far. But I've just been contacted by a Torogian from Janova. He said he had some information.
Do you think it's worth checking out?.
Yes, go to Janov. I think Thorus can handle it here for now. If not, we'll send more men.
I got it. I'll be there soon.
Hello, Hawaiian. Legolas tells me you have business with me.
Truly my friend. It's about our common misfortune, the Sin clan.
Do you know anything in particular? .
We can say that yes. A group of free walkers from the southern Zone showed up here on Janova the other day. They're in charge of the World One. They bought cartridges and food for several days from me. I asked them, as usual, what plans they have for the near future, and whether they need any help or advice. Guys are not local, and probably do not know that we have as it is not safe, and in recent times even more. .
Well, what do sinners have to do with it?.
You keep listening. The peacekeeper says, "We are not here by chance, Nazar hired us. I told him why he doesn't need any volunteers, if he's already got enough people. Nearly half of the locals have joined them in the last month. And he told me: Nazar's job is that a group is needed. .
What's the task?.
Act. Anyway World said- Nazar wants to test one theory about possible control of sinners from outside.
Well, there you go. What's next?
World with his own gone. And as they say with the ends. I informed Loki of this. His men followed the group for a while, then stopped. Loki said, "Fuck that, they've already fuckin' killed fuckin' people on Zaton, and it's no use. We couldn't find any psi artifacts there anyway. So me that's what it seems that no artifacts do not exist, but Nazar really became aware of the truth in the matter with the sinners.
I think I'll ask him myself. I wonder if he's not being subtle. After all, as Granit said Nazar put forward a version of the artifacts.
You ask, just one more thing. The World group seems to be the same as on Zaton the Sword with the Svobodavs. Oh, this is not a clean case...
OK, thanks for the tip.
Well, hello, Nazar. Anything you want to explain to me?
What do you mean, Major?
I'm talking about your sinners binge. Like, they have psi artifacts. Two groups have already gone down on Zaton. And half of them were your people. And then I find out you've assembled another group from the outside. Do you know what for?
That's it, Major, don't be fuming. It all makes sense to me now. I'll explain everything.
Try harder.
It looks like I've really managed to hit the right trail. And a group of Worlds was hired by me precisely to test it. As for the artifact version, I've never put it forward myself and I think it's utter nonsense...
Wait, what about...because Granit said...
Granit came up with it himself. And he persuaded me to support the idea. Now I found out that he was stupidly setting me up - he passed his words off as my own. That's why we're on the wrong track and we've already killed two groups. Because of Granite, not me - trust me. .
That's how it is, and the World. What do you need him for?.
I had an idea. That someone really is controlling the sinners. Except that it's hardly a matter of any special artefacts. I talked to Garin, he consulted with the scientists, as to whether this is possible. They say we do not know how, but heard that the Americans have managed to create a drug that allows you to increase a person's psi threshold. I don't quite understand it. It also allows one to perceive mental orders from outside without any pain or damage to the basic brain activity. That is to be simultaneously a normal human being and at the same time remain a soulless zombie doing someone else's will. .
Fucking hell, why didn't you share your insights before. So what's the world supposed to know then?"
Listen, friend. Of course, I understand that you need the information and stuff, but I also need to benefit from it. So far, it's been nothing but losses for the faction. We're not "The Debt" or "Liberty" to be giving away combat quads left and right. So, already at least a dozen of my men have died because of my miscalculation with the Granite. .
It's your own fault, you could have suspected something fishy about that stalker. Okay, what do you want?
If you can do one favor for the clan, I'll tell you what the group of Worlds did and how to use it against the sinners. How's that for you?
I agree.
My faction is slowly gaining strength. We're trying not to hole up in the tunnel and get devoured by mutants or mauled by sinners. Gradually my people are moving toward Zaton, and increasingly active patrolling the adjacent territory and assisting other stalker clans in the struggle against the "Sin" and "Monolith" sectarians. But there remains one unresolved issue that is simply vital to the stalkers of any clan. Unfortunately Legolas is now on Zaton and did not have time to finish what he started, so this problem to the end you'll solve..
What do I have to do?
You will need to create group caches at some key points. Our stalkers have become well-equipped, but now all sorts of situations arise. So without common hiding places, staffed with everything you need, you can't. Legolas marked the places of future hiding places, but did not have time to fill them. So it must be done soon.
What's to pack? A gas mask and a AK will suffice?
Do we look like losers with AKs? So, the cache will fill as follows: stock of medicines and food, I think on one military medical kit and Drypayku will be enough; weapon-there's your choice you want to lay there our Russian or the same natovskih, but not the old AKM and not M16. With uniforms, there is only our special Dawn armored suits and helmets. PC-2 or PC-3b will do just fine. And an anomaly detector. I think Veles will do. All should lay five caches, as you do all discuss the further situation with the sinners.
And where am I supposed to find so many of your armour and helmets? And the rest, not worth five rubles.
What a cheapskate you are, Major. About the uniforms - when you leave the base you go along the railway before the fork in Janov, turn left, there's a small ravine, it is our common temporary hiding place. There is a part of a necessary outfit, as well as artifacts, and money that you can spend on not enough.. .
Got it, I'll be back when I do.
All, Nazar, your caches are filled with everything you need. Now say everything you know.
Thank you, Major, for your help, as far as the Mirny group is concerned: as I have learned from his reports, the sinners use a special psi drug. I do not know anything about its action and purpose. But it seems to be exactly what we were looking for. The world has learned that the drug is supplied by people funded from overseas. Namely the Alpha unit. The leader of the sinners, who controls the supply of drugs is called Demonolog - it seems he is one of the most important figures in their clan. Stalker also learns that the Demonologo has a meeting planned with "Alpha" in the near future.
Location and time?
For the Zaton north of the Sawmill. I think you know where that is. Legolas will assist you. There has been no further contact from the world. Most likely the sinners found his group and killed them all, but his PDA signal can still be picked up. So get over there. I still haven't heard the last report from Peacekeeper. I think he has something in his PDA for you.
Okay, I'll find his band.
And Major, once you find the Worldly, you don't have to come to me anymore - go straight to the Zaton to Legolas, he will now coordinate the Dawn against the sinners. I'm the reason those two groups on Zaton are dead. He's in charge of all that spy stuff now. As for me, our people will always help in any way they can, no matter where it's needed. .
But you were set up by Granite, it's not your fault the stalkers died. And Granite, if met, will get what he deserves.
If only you can find him. Legolas informed me that as soon as you left for Janov, Granite disappeared somewhere, he seems to be a sinner himself and now you'll only get him if you get him in combat. If you manage to get through to the clan leaders, there's going to be a full-blown faction war with the sectarians. The same thing that happened two years ago in the days of Clear Skies may happen. We will, as I said, support those who will stand up against the sectarians. You, on the other hand, discuss it with Shulga and Loki later. "Duty and Liberty will fight that's for sure, only they'll probably be afraid to enter enemy territory and will limit themselves to expelling them from their immediate vicinity. They don't want a repeat of the carnage that occurred in Pripyat and under the walls of Chernobyl, when Strelok cut off the incinerator. You will need to enlist their support and convince them to go all the way. .
I will learn about it. First, this war must be waged.
Legolas, I have some good news. I managed to find what we were looking for.
Yes, I already know - Nazar told me everything. Well, then it will be necessary to attack the Demonologist during their meeting with the "Alpha"..
Already after talking to Nazar, I found the PDA of the stalker he hired, here take a look. Here is all the information regarding the sinners. The most interesting and inexplicable is that most likely, and some particularly clever mutants have had a hand, or whatever they have in all this mess - boron. .
It sure is a hell of a thing, Major. Looks like someone too serious is behind the sectarians. New mutants that have only just appeared. Psionics who are helping these sinners, their joint action with the Monolith and foreign units. These special agents like Anubis... .
I believe this is the work of the O-Consciousness, or whatever they've become since their ranks were thinned by Shooter. I've never been able to get a coherent explanation for what's become of them. And Anubis himself had told me to turn back. They're no match for me. .
All right, Major, don't bother. The main thing now is to stop the Sin sectarians. The rest, as it goes. So, I'll send the scouts and a few experienced stalkers who have agreed to help us to the Sawmill. They'll have to let me know when the Sinners and the Alpha come into their sights. Wait for the night, they will inform. .
Well, what do you think of Granite?. .
Bitch he is. Not a sinner, by any means. Sounds like he's just trying to work for them, so he's breaking in his own. I reckon they'll do him in, and if not, we'll do him. .
OK, I'll be in touch.
Comrade Colonel, I have good news.
Let me guess which ones. Have you succeeded in destroying all the sinners on Zaton?.
With your help, Comrade Lieutenant Colonel. "The Duty has greatly helped the simple stalkers from Skadovsk get rid of the threat of the sectarians. .
Yeah. However, we managed to achieve quite a bit. Many of their field commanders and spirit guides have been killed, including the Demonologist. Disrupted the supply of their psi drugs. Destroyed their large base on the ship "Taras Shevchenko", destroyed psionics, affecting their leaders. Yes, we have something to be proud of. But it is not enough. .
That's right. It has come to my attention that another equally odious leader of the sinners, Osiris, is now here in the vicinity of Jupiter.
Yes, that thing is here. But we'll nail him soon, too. Most of the sinners are now clustered around the Jupiter factory. It's a large unit that holds the key checkpoint at the intersection of important roads, and they also control the Container Depot to the west of the factory. Therefore, before attempting an assault on their main base at Jupiter, it is necessary to eliminate the sinners at two key points. Nazar and I have agreed to attack the Container Depot together, and then advance on Jupiter. The mercenaries will also be on hand to help us retake the factory. Loki, on the other hand, promised to deal with those at the checkpoint. .
This is good, only a raid into Pripyat is just necessary later on. The main leader of the sinners Hades is hiding there, possibly Anubis is also there now, and if we don't strike a blow to their lair, then all our successes here will go to waste. With the help of the monoliths the sinners will gather strength in Pripyat, and strike again. So can I count on the help of the Dolg in the raid on Pripyat?
All right, Degtrev, we agree. Although our previous raid into the city nearly ruined the faction, we'll support you.
Agreed. Nazar agrees too, all that's left is to convince Loki.
Talk to him right now and tell his men to start attacking the checkpoint, if they manage to take control of the crossroads, me and the Dawners will launch an immediate assault on the sinners' positions. .
I get it, after the Liberty and I take over the checkpoint I will advance to the point to connect with your quads.
First_talking..
Loki, raise your fighters, I think it's time to clear the vicinity of Jupiter of sinners.
I get it, Hannibal has just returned from Zaton, he will also lead the unit here. You can go to him, he's already waiting.
Yes, just one more request.
What else?.
The remaining clans and neutral stalkers have agreed to raid Pripyat after destroying the sinners on Jupiter. "Will Freedom give us a hand?". .
Yes, Major, Freedom will provide further assistance in this war. I can't wait to see the severed head of this Anubis and other creatures. .
Me too, all me to Hannibal.
Goodbye.
Mayor, where do you go, my fighters are already waiting. Can't wait to strike these sinful scum.
Hello, Hannibal, do you have any information about the enemy forces stationed at the checkpoint area?
Yes, Major. Anyway, my scouts have reported that there's now some sort of council of field commanders of the Sin clan gathered at the checkpoint. About five people, and the actual clan fighters guarding the commanders are not much. Best time to strike now. .
Well, they don't really need security. Again, all in the exa with gausses on their shoulders. Against such a tank one on one really can not go.
Oh, who's to say. How many of those did you take down on Zaton? That's right, so we'll get through it. But that's not all. The main squads of sinners are patrolling that area now, so once there's a firefight at the checkpoint, we'll have to wait for the guests. They won't have time to get there right away, but they will, so it's important to take out all the sinners at the checkpoint as quickly as possible and have time to fortify yourself in order to repel their patrols' counterattacks. .
We will. As soon as it's done, I'm moving out to the control point immediately for a further offensive with the Debtors.
We're not going any further with you, Major. There's been no orders from my superiors. I think the "Duty" with the "Dawn" will take care of it. If only, when you get to "Jupiter" we'll help, but maybe not, we rush straight to Pripyat. .
Whatever you like, that's how you do it-all move out.
Major, I am Anurak. I'm in charge of the operation to stop the Sinners from meeting the Alpha.
Are those scouts with you?.
Yes, their commander Lynx-all under my temporary command. Waiting only for your command and move out to the enemy positions.
Are they there yet?
The Lynx spotted the appearance of Alpha fighters near the Sawmill. I think the sinners are already there too. Demonologue - their commander, will likely also be with his people.
All right, let's go, take the Demonologist alive.
If it works.
Must get Anurak, must....
Shit, Major. It was such a great operation, though. "The Alpha was destroyed, so were the sinners, and the Demonologist creature escaped. .
He couldn't have gone far. It is no accident his fighters were just beginning to move to VNZ. But they could immediately take it, then it would be more trouble.. .
I didn't expect the sinner to attack us. Eh, and still a great job we did, except where he might have gone. But wait, there's a second exit from VNZ through the tunnel. He went straight to the Topi, and there from anywhere - look for it now. .
I'll check anyway. And you and the guys pull up to Skadovsk afterwards, I don't think the sinners will just leave it at that. Looks like we finally started a war today, Lynx. .
I'll do everything Major. And the war has been going on for a long time. It's just that now the enemy has realized that he can't just take us. It does not make it easier for us....
OK, I'm in the tunnel...
Yes, by the way. Our leader Ajax will now be fueling at Skadovsk instead of Granite. So, be aware of that.. .
Great, except I wish Granite had a lead hello, that would be great...
aah, major....pharmacy....
Oops, look who's talking. That's what we've got here. Ah, Granitushka...Didn't expect to see you here, thought I'd find the Demonologist....
...dem...nol.g...bitch....
What should have been proven. And how much did you sell us out for, you creature?.
...Hades.... is waiting...for...you all to die....
Only you won't see it anymore....
Legolas, the sinners' deal with the Alpha is blown. Granite is dead, but the Demonologist is gone...
I got it, Major. That's all well and good. But I just got word: large formations of Sin sectarians were seen on the approach to the Preobrazhensky Bridge. It looks like the Demonologist has decided to take action. Major, talk to Ajax, he's waiting. But do not hesitate....
good..
It seems that Lynx was talking about you specifically. Haven't we met before?
Yes, Major, about me. I've seen you before at the storming of Skadovsk. And when the bandits attacked the Staircase. .
I see, so you're replacing Granite now?
You got that right. Lynx, on the other hand, will lead the scout troop. He gave me a message that the Demonologist has gone into hiding.
The bitch is gone. But I managed to find Granite.
I hope that thing gets what it deserves.
Don't hesitate. Legolas says you have urgent business with me.
Yeah. So it looks like the Demonologist has decided to hit us back. I guess the sinners weren't expecting us to hear about their rendezvous at the Stairway. But that won't stop the enemy, rest assured. The demonologist has gathered his main forces into a fist and is ready to deliver a crushing blow to Skadovsk. .
We must not allow the sinners to get close to the dryships. It is unlikely we shall be able to defend it again.
You're right. A shell doesn't fall into the same funnel twice. That's why we need to lock them up on the way in. While you and Lynx were chasing the Demonologist, the allies got here. The Dolga and Dawn Quads. They've already taken up positions near the old barge. Anurak, by the way, is already there too. We're already waiting for the Sinners to attack.
My move?.
Go to the Shevchenko ship. The scout squad should be waiting for you there. Move out together to the old barge. The sinners should begin their offensive in about an hour. So hurry up.
understood, speaking.
Good luck..
Ajax, the attack of the sinners is repulsed. Most of the sectarians have been destroyed.
A Demonologist, did you manage to eliminate him?
I don't know if he was even there. Such a massacre. If he was commanding his own forces there, he's probably dead.
I see, in general you can't guarantee to fix it.
I can't..
OK. I have some thoughts on the situation, by the way. But it will have to wait until tomorrow. A detachment of a known stalker in the zone should be coming here right now to help us solve the problem of sectarians. So you come up to me tomorrow too.
I will definitely be.
Listen, don't you know how you can hack a stalker's PDA.
Yes, I do. You'll need special hacking utilities for that. You have to buy them.
And where do I get them? .
I'll help you get them, only you'll have to work for me first. Run my errands, and then we'll talk.
Goodbye.
So what are the instructions now? .
And what do you think they might be Major, we have to finish the creatures off and chase them away from the Zaton.
Don't you think they'll get the hell out of here on their own? After all, we managed to destroy most of their forces.
No, the Debtors were not lazy to examine the corpses. Allarich told me afterwards that there was no Demonologist among the murdered sinners. And if he is alive, he will try to attack us again. Only we won't wait for that.
Anything specific on the Demonologue?.
Yes, a thought flashed through here the day before, and now it has been fully confirmed. So listen: despite this defeat, the sinners are still too strong, and as proof of this, they have decided to hold a kind of meeting very close to Skadovsk. .
What's the rally?.
The Lynx reported that the scouts saw small groups of sinners of three, four people making their way towards the Shevchenko ship throughout last night. And among them they managed to discern someone familiar.
And who?.
These stalkers were considered by many to be hermits, they were known in the southern Zone, but later these men marked violent crimes against ordinary stalkers. Sargeant, the half-mad Imp, who murdered walkers in cold blood, and Screw. .
Is he the one who tried to kill the Swamp Doctor?.
Yes, that's the one. They're all sinners now. And agree, they are unlikely to converge on the ship for nothing.
So what are we waiting for, shall we hit.... .
Wait, Major, you're not going in there alone. Allarich has taken his Debtors and Torus the Dawnbreakers to Janov, and Anurak will also be with them for some time, but you have other company.
And who, if it's not a secret?.
Hemul, you may have heard of such a stalker. He and his men will be approaching Skadovsk soon.

The same as you - come to kill the sinners. More specifically, to avenge the sectarians for killing veteran Ivan Taiga, who was in the same clan as Hemul. .

Naturally, go he's waiting for you.
So, are you the same SBU Major who has been stirring up the entire northern Zone lately?.
Are you the Hemul, then? Didn't think I'd meet.
Yeah, something about your face is familiar to me, weren't you a stalker before?. .
There was a case, only in the past, now I'm only official.
I see. Right, then, straight to the point. Coon and Yankel have just returned from a reconnaissance trip. As we supposed, ship "Shevchenko" now controlled by sinners. Not many people, about twenty.... .
That's it? Looks like we nibbled them pretty good the other day.
Heard, sorry we didn't make it to that barbecue, but I assure you those twenty are more than enough. There aren't many ordinary rank-and-file sinners among them. Mostly all known odious murderers. And there's probably a Demonologist among them. .
Yes, they can't be missed now, when else will they all come together like this? .
Nevermore, all perform...
performance....
Legolas, I have good news. My stalkers and I have wiped out a lot of sinful leaders. Demonologist, also killed.

What did you think, he's been trampling the Zone for six years for a reason. Only pity he can't help us any more. Said they urgently need to Militar, so now you are unlikely to meet him in the near future. .

Yeah, and hurry up. Looks like the faction has all their main forces there and not letting them take Janov's station is our priority. And also talk to the leaders of the "Dolg" and "Liberty". I think they'll coordinate the clans against the sinners. And try to convince them of the need to go to Pripyat. .

Do you think they'll just watch?.
No, they will fight, but not the whole thing. If we wipe out most of the sinners, the monoliths won't want any further carnage. They've got enough military right now. .
All right, I'll talk to Shulga first, I think "The Debt" won't refuse to help.
Listen, do you know if anyone suspicious has come to Skadovsk lately?
Well there were a few people, why? Did something happen?
Yes, our contact was killed.
Shit, it's certainly bad news, and there's no one else to even think about. There don't seem to be any accomplices to the sinners who know about your actions on Skadovsk. Wait a minute though, a libertarian came by the court yesterday. Stayed a short time, did not talk to anyone, bought one soup from the Beard and left. .
Freedomlord...maybe it's an old acquaintance of mine?
Anubis? Unlikely, he disappeared from the Freedom clan just as Varg died.
I'm not sure he's completely cut ties with the Freemen. The mercenaries recently caught Anubis' associates in Freedom. They were executed at the Jupiter plant. I think he's decided to get his revenge... .
I don't know, by the way do you want the news?

Remember those weird mutants you shot off on Jupiter? They've been seen here too.
Where exactly?.
At Emerald. Incidentally, that's where your freedom fighter went as well, right after he left Skadovsk. Ajax the scout leader told me that. Immediately after that those mutants were found there. .
I'm going to go for a run to Emerald....
Stalker...
Bah, Major, you came after all! I knew you'd fall for those mutants....
I see you've been promoted to Freedom - you're wearing an exo,...wait and don't be sarcastic Anubis, or I'll put a bullet in your head...
Stay away spetsura, I think you'll get that chance, but not now. If you move, you'll die, I'm not kidding....
Oh, you scared me! You don't even have a rifle....
I don't need it anymore, I can beat you with something stronger, at least with a gauss gun you know, at point-blank range. .
I think that's enough talking to you....
Don't make me brainwash you, I assure you I know how to do it...
Fuck, something I don't really believe you again...
Listen, how do you think I led the pseudosnorks to Emerald?. .
Are you a controller.... .
Worse, so are you-ready to talk now?
All set, what do you want? .....
For you - not so much - get out of the Zone while you're alive, you won't be able to do it all... You have no idea where you are going....
.... introducing...
No, my friend. That's it, you've completed your main task, you've dealt with the failure of your Operation Farwatte, now go away. There's nothing more for you here. .
No, there's one thing to shoot you...
No way.
Let's see, tell me if you're so all-powerful why you're messing with me, just get it over with, it turns out you need me...
See how clever you are, and I can always kill you...
So what do you want, because I'm trying so hard to ruin all your plans, don't you care?
My plans?.
Yes. Stalking factions, working with sinners? .
Is it called plans that you've ruined? What if it's not at all the way you envisioned it Major? What if I did everything on purpose for you to ruin it? .
I don't understand why you're doing this?
Let's start in order. First, you helped the Debtors destroy the supposedly mercenary-controlled weapons depot and Freedom, then I coordinated your actions in the elimination of especially zealous Debtors, then you took out Warg, who, as you understand was just a sinner infiltrated the "Debt". You helped Loki a lot, and speaking of Loki, I wish we'd worked more closely together. Helped me in everything....
What's your point?.
Wait, after you ruined the hopes of all the local bros to take control of Skadovsky, wiped out several groups of new brutes, cleared the Zone of zombies, and killed many of my men. Well, it looks like you've done enough to get yourself shot, but I'm not gonna do that. Instead, I'm gonna let you go, Major, while you got a chance, stay out of my way, it's not your game. .
Who are you?.
Haven't you figured it out yet? Let's just say - the chain dog of the masters of the Zone. Settles it like this. .
No, are you an O-Consciousness?. .
Who, Shooter prompted? He'll be dealt with too, don't worry. That man is also far gone, but not so far as to leave him alive. .
Stalker is not in the Zone.
Huh, you're a bad agent after all, Major. I had a better opinion of you than... All right, forget it. Everyone leave before I change my mind...
I don't think we'll agree.
I didn't count on it.
Me too.
Loki, there's talk...
What do you want?.
From you personally, only the truth. How are you related to Anubis?
No way now. That thing I'd personally strangle if I could find it. He wasn't a Free Spirit, Smart Guy sent me a helper with the Militaria, but as I later found out - Anubis killed him and took his place. How he did it, I have no idea. .
He has psi powers, no wonder you couldn't tell the difference between him and the dead freedom fighter.
Damn, that explains it all. But how is that possible, is he a mutant?
I don't know. What do you intend to do now?
I explained everything to the mercenaries and the Duty. They seemed to believe me. At least the conflict with the debtors was resolved. And the blue in addition agreed to help, and opened a safari on Anubis and his associates. .
I'm aware of the blue safari. Hog's men are on it. They've already killed Ares and Rover, Anubis' closest associates.
They'll get to him too, soon..... so...message from Hog.....
What is it?.
It looks like our chick has made it, he was caught by the mercenaries on Zaton near the Substation Shops. Go to Hog and make sure Anubis gets what he deserves. .
I will,
Mayor, you're right on time again. We got your elusive one.
Every pleasure, Hog.
Don't you think it's d?j? vu, Major, just the other day we caught Ares his sidekick, and now Anubis has the same fate?
This is a nice deja vu Hog, ok I'll talk to him.
Only for a short time, my hands are itching to cum this bitch fast.
I'll try...
Ah Major, small world isn't it, just seen you...
Yes, it's a small world for you and me. You will have to leave it for good...
Where do I go, I'm already here, inside...
Inside what?. .
What, inside you, Major, is the enemy in reflection....
Kill him immediately, he's a psionic!!!!!....

I mean, through and through. We seem to have underestimated the enemy's capabilities. His possible talents beyond comprehension. Psi abilities and whatnot...
This is what you call othering???? Speak, now listen. Anubis is only human, albeit one with a mutant congenital handicap, a mutant that is. A very powerful psionic, that's all. You don't have to make up anything super cool. Not Sin, not Monolith, not Alpha, but O-Consciousness.
Yes, Major. To be honest we've suspected this for a long time. Only we relied on the information of the shooter, who left the Zone along with the "Scat" group. .
He said he destroyed the O-Consciousness.
There is no confirmation of this. He may have killed some of them, but not all of them. And besides, it was reported from HQ that Shooter disappeared again, and a day later he was supposedly seen in the Borderlands. You say, just for fun. .
No, and Anubis hinted that Shooter had gone into the Zone again.
Why are we racking our brains, Major. You yourself seem to have found documents to prove that Shooter, Scar and a few other no lesser-known individuals were participants in the S.T.A.L.K.E.R. experiment, which was apparently conducted by O-Consciousness. Therefore we cannot fully trust them, because we do not know what the essence of this experiment is. But this is all lyric, we will figure it out later and not us. We have a new task from HQ Major. .
What again?
Not again, but again. So it's like this. It seems that all that happened just that with Anubis spurred the enemy into action. Before that, it was just flowers and local skirmishes. Now the sinners have unleashed their hands and launched a war against the rest of the clans. Unspokenly they are supported by the Monolith. So the main thing now is to stop the "sin" at all costs. Go to the Zaton, there to meet with the new commander of the Stalkers on the "Skadovsk. And you begin to act. .
Anything else?
Not yet. I think you've had enough of these worries. And I'll dig in about O-Consciousness for now, they can't be discounted either. Obviously Sin will act at their behest, but I don't think they're all-powerful enough to be invincible. All right, so long. .
See you again, Colonel.

Which one?. .
Military. They did manage to get wind of our relay installations and are now trying to locate and study them.

Yes, my brother. One of our bases used to be on Zaton, at the Waste Treatment Station. But we left there about a year ago. The repeaters were demanted and safely hidden inside the station's equipment. Eh, why didn't we think of destroying them then....
And now what?
Now the goblins are preparing an operation to find this equipment. I don't know where they got the information about our old base. Maybe it was the mercenaries, I heard one of their troops was looking for something particularly carefully there in the station, maybe someone else tried, but the fact remains - the goblins have established a raid in the area, and we need to stop them. .
I agree to stop them, what should I do?
Okay, Cyborg has partially already taken care of this operation by sending a squad of our saboteurs, led by Janissary, to the Zaton. Go to Zaton and talk to him. I think your joint action will ensure our success.
I'll do it.
I have no doubt...
So you'll be the one to assist us?. .
Yes, me. What's the situation?
We're a little late. The technicians have already occupied the building, though they haven't been able to find anything yet, but it's only a matter of time..
What do you propose?. .
Let's do this: take these charges, set them up when I drop you a signal and the coordinates of the detonation points, now let's move out while the goblins aren't so numerous. They have possible air support, but we will try to take it upon ourselves, so your main task is to place mines. When you do it, go far away from the station, it'll blow up like hell. Charges- we'll set in motion.
Let's go.
Roll out.
Woland, your old equipment on Zaton is destroyed, infidels will not be able to use it against us.
Really this is the best news I've heard in a while. You did a great job, Monolith is pleased with you - here's your reward.
Thank you. Can I ask you one question?
question, brother.
Why did you, knowing that I am associated with the military, allow me into your ranks?
There was an order from above not to interfere with you. It didn't come from Cyborg or Guron. I cannot tell you who it came from. But soon you will know the truth, I promise. Now go....
I hope it's not too late...
It won't be...
I have good news, Comrade Colonel.
Well, what have you got there, Major?
The Sinners' covenant is broken up at Zaton and around Janov Station. Their leaders the Demonologist and Osiris are dead. The latter, however, repented of his sins before his death and helped me get some documents on the real activities of their sect.
What a sinner's repentance, funny, give me what you managed to find.
Here you go.
So, well. Looks like the game has actually taken a more serious turn than we thought. So the O-Consciousness hasn't been destroyed like Shooter told us before. That's too bad. So not only the Monolith, but Sin is now under the control of this mysterious organization. That's what we were afraid of. But for now we have more pressing matters to attend to. .
I think so too. The sinners lost most of their forces on Zaton and Jupiter. Another large unit I destroyed in the Pripyat-1 overpass. .
The rest of their forces, however, have occupied the city. The Monoliths are giving them substantial support, and we have the necessary forces to wage war with two sectarian clans at once.... .
Probably already is. I managed to convince the leaders of the stalker clans to unite against the sinners. .
Yes, I know that. Their small assault squads arrived in Pripyat a few hours ago. But unfortunately there is no unity among them. They have scattered alone all over the city, trying to dislodge the sectarians from key points, but there is no communication with them, so I can assume that the scattered action has led to their deaths. That's why you need to look into the matter. You are an experienced saboteur, and I think you will be able to do it.
What will my task be?
The main sectarian forces are now converging on the Jubilee BWC. It seems that the head of the sinners, Hades, is based there. But there's no way to get through there yet, so we need to clear the rest of the city of sectarians first. We need to take key positions and destroy their patrols. Get out there now. We'll strike at their core once the city is clean and then, after the final defeat of the sinners, we'll decide what to do with the damn O-Consciousness. .
Done.
Mayor, I surrender. Don't shoot!
Oops... No, I guessed you were Osiris, but I wasn't entirely sure.
Lis is my real name. Even before I was one of the leaders of the sinners and was a simple stalker in the South cordon. Magpie, Flint, Osiris is nothing...
And so are you. So are we going to cut your throat right away, or should we talk first?.
I don't care. My life ended the day I was captured by the sectarians of the still old Sin clan and forced to taste human blood. After that I became one of them, but I found the strength to go back....
Some kind of Darth Vader, really. Then deign to say who controls your clan?
A few months ago, the sect was taken under mental control by new special mutants - psionics. Unlike simple controllers, psionics didn't fry our brains and turn us into zombies, but rather turned us into working dogs of their masters. .
And they gave you special medication? And what are the Hosts?.
The same as the Monolith. "O-Consciousness. We remained human, and got rid of the need for cannibalism, but became obedient slaves to the O-Consciousness, even more loyal than the Monolith. We have increased in number, we have received from the masters new weapons, equipment and orders - to take control of the entire northern zone: from Pripyat to Zaton. That is, to do what the Monolith failed. First we began to infiltrate our people to the stalkers and factions on "Skadovsk" and Yanova. You yourself know that I was personally involved in this, first appearing on Zaton under the name Soroka, then on Yanovo under the name Flint. .
Why weren't you killed by the freedom fighters after Loki found out about what you did on Skadovsk?
Anyways, I didn't really have time to do anything. Gaunt, scum, there broke my plans, then that stalker in the quarry - it was necessary to finish bitch. In short, I screwed up on my own. Anubis was already at work in Freedom, and he helped me avoid execution. After that, I only managed the actions of the other saboteurs - Warg, Myron, and Beetle. But Anubis played everything out. .
What do you know about him?
Anubis was once a military saboteur, he began working in the Zone as soon as it appeared. However, when he was assigned to find out who was behind the second catastrophe, he either slipped up or got carried away. In general, his own people let him go to waste. But he survived and decided to exact his revenge. He was brought into the clan, but did not remain in it long. After learning what he should have known during his mission he went straight to Chernobyl. Nothing was heard from him for a year afterwards. Everyone thought he was dead, but he wasn't. He managed to reach the centre and meet the Hosts there. And he was accepted. He became their hand executioner - the first test subject of perhaps the most terrible O-Consciousness experiment since the creation of the Zone - the S.T.A.L.K.E.R. project. A project to produce the perfect human with hidden abilities and talents. Participants in this project were to help the "O-Consciousness" to establish full control over the Zone in order to further expand it.. .
And the same subjects were Shooter and Scar?.
Yes. But Anubis was the first among them. The first to have the mark on his hand. And the strongest.
What happened next.
He returned to the South Zone in 2011 and took an active part in the events of that year. Strelk's first trek to the Chernobyl, plus the Clan War. "O-Consciousness learned that some stalker was seeking to infiltrate the restricted area in the heart of the Zone and decided to let him through. They needed new people for their project, but not just anyone, and only those who manage to get through the barrier alive and come close to the station itself. A kind of natural selection among those who wish to comprehend the unknown.
But it was a single ticket.
Right. Whoever made it would become another O-Consciousness test subject, the rest - who stumbled beyond the Barrier - would either die or join the Monolith faction. However, you know who managed to make it. Anubis, on the other hand, was in the Zone at the time, keeping an eye on what was going on. He reported to O-Consciousness on particularly zealous stalkers who might approach them. So in his field of vision got first Shooter, then Scar and some purebreds following their footsteps. Anubis did his best to make their path to the station more difficult, to weed out the weak and unworthy. The pitting of the Blues against the Freemen in the Dark Valley was, of course, his doing. He also helped the Renegades infiltrate and fortify the previously closed sector of Limansk, previously preventing the mercenaries, whom he had trapped in the Mobius Ring, from doing so. Before that, he'd used a powerful psi-stroke to kill the combined Freedom and Dolga units in control of the city.
And then what does he want now, and why exactly did you decide to tell me that?
Mayor, I'm already dead. I'm sick of this life. I don't know why, but I managed to escape the psi control of the Masters and didn't become their slave like other sinners. But I didn't show it, trying to understand why the O-Consciousness needed us. .
And did you manage to reveal their plans?
Particularly. Regarding the Sin clan, it's simple: the O-Consciousness didn't want to waste the forces of the Monolith, which had already suffered heavy losses after the storming of Chernobyl. We would have done our job - taken the north of the Zone under our control, besides the Hosts would have tested the new psy-control technology on us. After that our sect would cease to exist: leaders like me and the Demonologue and Hades would be killed, and simple sinners would join the ranks of the Monoliths. At least that's what Anubis said in his communication with the Masters.
But then I showed up and ruined your plans. Do you know anything else? Like about the Alpha Squad that links the CIA to the Masters of the Zone?
Not much. "Alpha was only indirectly helping us. And they didn't even know about the existence of O-Consciousness. It's just, you know - West can't stay away and everywhere, bitch, puts its nose where the Chernobyl dog didn't stick its dick.... .
I see, but so Anubis - what exactly does he want? And where can he be found?. .
This creature is like a seasoned chess player playing his game, rearranging the pieces as he sees fit. He wants to control all O-Consciousness activity in the Zone. And it benefited him that you were so eager to fight us. He seems to have personal interests unknown to the Hosts. He's a cunning beast, but I think he'll get what's coming to him. .
Do you think he can act without them telling him to?
Are you not?
Well, in general I think Anubis is capable of a lot, but not everything. Although, on the other hand, Shooter also seemed to say that he destroyed the O-Consciousness. .
Mayor, you still don't get it to the end. The Rifleman, as well as Scar, was used by the O-Consciousness in their project, though they were given a different role than Anubis. The gunman did indeed cleanse the ranks of the O-Consciousness during his second campaign, but he did not destroy all of them. It seems that there is no unity in the organisation. But that's your headache. I have told you all I know....
And now, after all this, you think that...
I'm not thinking anything anymore, I've already made my decision. I forgot, if you're in Pripyat, find my hiding place. It's in one of the basements. My notes are there, you'll learn more about Anubis. Now get out of the way. I've got C-4 with me. It'll explode in a few minutes. I didn't do it for nothing by telling you all this and keeping you alive after all. Stop Anubis, otherwise something terrible might happen... .
I'll do anything. Sorry to hear about you... Goodbye...
Major, I am ordered to support you for further action against the sectarians.
Where have you been before? .
As soon as the command instructed us to go to Pripyat, we arrived immediately. Stalkers from the allied clans reached here via the Pripyat-1 overpass a few hours ago...
Well, Samoilov, as always, has done all the work, and at the end comes the help, who gets all the laurels of the winners.
Major, I have my orders, and so do you- this is not the time to figure out who is right and who is wrong. Hades the leader of the sinners has occupied the Jubilee BWC building with his remaining forces. He is supported by Monolith sectarians. Intelligence says there are about thirty militants in total. We need to attack now before the sectarians get reinforcements. .
If the sinners are defeated, the Monolith will not continue fighting.
Where did you get this information?
I just know. So, let's get to work?
Yes, I think we can beat them - go for it.
Comrade Colonel, what are you doing here?
Hey, Major. Good to see you alive. And don't ask me why I followed you into this asshole...
Father?
Well, who else. Command said "-We do!", the soldier replied "We do!". Only the figures aren't soldiers, they're the tougher ones.
Are there any special assignments?. .
You don't fuss, Sanya, they will. Well done, that situation with Kowalski cleverly handled. And what you stayed here is also praiseworthy. Now the staff has a headache on another subject and it seems that you and I will have to deal with this mess.
Comrade Colonel, allow me to report my final thoughts.
Allow. Just let's have a less formal tone, yeah. Otherwise, with that "Comrade Colonel"... You know, what do you got there?
First of all: there is now a problem with unusual zombie activity. It started immediately after Kowalski's evacuation with the remnants of the Scat group....
I've heard that before. Local stalkers who took over the Laundry right after the military left are now just talking about it. I believe it happened for a reason, and there must be someone behind the psi blast. However, it's better to deal with the zombie problem now. I think that if we don't intervene, stalkers from the clans may have big problems. .
That's right. They'll spend a lot of time and effort destroying the zombified. Plus possible casualties. This could weaken the already shaky position of the leading factions in these places. .
Right thinking. And weakening the clans is not good for us right now. You know where that goes.
I know. And I'm guessing who might benefit.
That's more. But we'll discuss that later. But for now, go and mesmerize the terrain. Oh, and by the way, if you haven't done your research on the secret labs, don't come to me yet. In short, as long as you have something to do.
Yes..
Well, Major, here we meet again...
Are you surprised?
Eh, what a man, eh? It would be so pathetic to kill... Especially after everything you've done. So many slaughtered, so many slaughtered, so many innocent souls slaughtered... A whole clan of sectarians...
No more than you.
That's right. But this is my case. No one will ever know about it, but your fame now paces ahead of you. You're more popular in the Zone now than Shooter. Just a perfect candidate for object "number five" you know what project.. .
And don't expect me to be like you - a slave to that pathetic group of mad scientists from O-Consciousness.
Uh, you're like that all at once. What other options do you have now? See these? Six perfect killers. We raised them in a parallel project. All ex-specialists, now executioners of our will. All I have to do is move my hand and they'll incinerate you on the spot. .
And what are you offering me?
Join Major, you're going to love it. We control everything here and will control even more. We will expand the boundaries of our house with your help. Your word?" .
I agree. What next?
Never. Better to die...
True choice. I knew we could count on you. And Grechet knew. Now you're going to be one of the Masters of the Zone. The fact that you eliminated the Sin Clan is no big deal. I originally told Krechet that taking control of a second sect was a bad idea. And you confirmed it. You should only bet on the Monolith. Now, I'm texting you the coordinates, and if you get there, there will be representatives of the Monolith group waiting for you from our secret base in the Tesla Zone. They'll escort you to Gyrfalcon. See you Major, now we will work together....
I got it, brother....
Good job, Major. Made the right choice after all. I knew you wouldn't let them control you....
Slayer, how did you end up here? And Scar's here.
Yes, Major, we were watching you, we were on the safety net so to speak. And would have intervened if you made a bad decision....
But you're also members of that damn S.T.A.L.K.E.R. project. How can I trust you now? .
You don't have to. It will be your right. But you have an obligation to know the whole truth. How do you agree to listen?.
Yes, tell me everything-- no secrets.
You're right about a lot of things. After Scar and I were treated by O-Consciousness, we really stopped being mere humans. Basically we were supposed to become executioners like Anubis, but only chance decided the outcome of this whole game. .
What do you mean?
I'm referring to the split within the O-Consciousness itself.
That's how it is. Well, go on...
As you know, O-Consciousness was originally one of the secret projects that began operating in the Zone immediately after the first disaster in 1986. Its original purpose was to make people aware of what they did not yet understand. It touched on various aspects concerning the knowledge of new physical and other principles of the universe. A whole network of different laboratories, working on a single project, was set up in the Zone with money from the secret service. But their main task was to check the hypothesis of noosphere existence, the informational shell of the Earth. The experiments they conducted yielded stunning results, confirming a two-way connection between the noosphere and all living organisms on the planet through a so-called psi-field. With its help, they planned to improve the world by influencing people. The O-Consciousness staff decided to connect to the noosphere directly by combining their minds into one in a special complex near the Chernobyl nuclear power station. However, on April 12, 2006, at 14:33, the experiment went out of control and the anomalous energy of the noosphere rushed to the planet's surface and changed the physical laws in the Exclusion Zone, which is now called the "Zone".
What's next....
The disaster that occurred changed the minds of the scientists involved in the project themselves. "The O-Consciousness gained infinite power over this small territory. After that, the Monolith itself and the sect of the same name already appeared, which began to protect scientists. But over time, the scientists' opinions on the course of things in the Zone began to differ. Among the scientists there were two undisputed leaders - Professor Krechet and Professor Severov. Krechet became an odious tyrant who dreams of unlimited power. During one of the O-Consciousness sessions, Krechet managed to subjugate the minds of the other scientists. They were no longer human, their minds could no longer control their human shell - they became eternal prisoners of the information field to which they were connected. All except Professor Severov. He managed to survive, though he looked no longer human, but barely moving handicapped. And he realized that it was necessary to stop Krechet before he carried out his plan. .
And then what did they do?.
Krechet realized that Severov could not be subdued. He could not simply take him and kill him. Then the integrity of the collective mind of the O-Consciousness would be compromised, and similarly Severov could not kill Krechet. There was a stalemate, and then Krechet decided to launch a project "S.T.A.L.K.E.R.", the basic concepts of which were developed even before the second disaster. According to this project, a series of experiments were conducted on the test subjects, which endowed them with superpowers. The first subject was Anubis. Admittedly, he was Krechet's most successful invention. You know he had the psychic ability of mutants but was still human. Then, in 2011, it was Scar and I, and Lebedev and Kalancha, who fell into the hands of O-Consciousness. That is when Severov entered the game. He changed some of the parameters in the experiment on me and Scar. So he programmed me to kill myself, in this case he suggested that in my search for myself I will go to Chernobyl and meet with the "Oh-Consciousness". And maybe I would be able to destroy it. Severov had it all figured out. He knew that if I killed even a single corporeal shell in the flask, I would destroy Krechet and his plans. But what Severov didn't count on was one thing. He knew that Scar and I had been treated as well as Anubis. But he had no idea what Krechet had done to Lebedev and Kalancha. Krechet managed to divide the integrity of the O-Consciousness project. He managed to create redundant sources of connection to the information field. .
And where are they?
He has placed them in a laboratory in the Tesla Zone. Lebedev and Kalancha, the leaders of Clear Sky, became the new reserve members of O-Consciousness. Severov found this out too late. But he was lucky again. When I came to Chernobyl to destroy the "O-Consciousness", he managed to separate from the collective mind and escape. And I killed the already completely unnecessary waste material. .

I'm referring to the split within the O-Consciousness itself.
So that's it, go on...
As you know? Originally, O-Consciousness was one of the secret projects that began operating in the Zone immediately after the first disaster in 1986. Its original purpose was to realize what humanity had not yet understood. It touched on various aspects concerning the knowledge of new physical and other principles of the universe. A whole network of various laboratories working on a single project was set up in the Zone with the money of the secret service. But their main task was to check the hypothesis of noosphere existence, the informational shell of the Earth. The carried out experiments yielded stunning results, confirming a two-way connection between noosphere and all living organisms of the planet through the so called psi-field. With its help, they planned to improve the world by influencing people. The O-Consciousness staff decided to connect to the noosphere directly by combining their minds into one in a special complex near the Chernobyl nuclear power station. However, on April 12, 2006, at 14:33, the experiment went out of control and anomalous noosphere energy rushed to the planet's surface and changed the physical laws in the exclusion zone, which is now called "The Zone".
What's next....
